alert.note: Alert for Jefferson Davis; Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued November 29 at 4:56PM CST until November 29 at 5:15PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN MARION AND SOUTHERN JEFFERSON DAVIS COUNTIES... At 456 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Society Hill, or 12 miles north of Columbia, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and tennis ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Carson around 505 PM CST. Melba around 515 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Bassfield. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
